thread.title: Report: Pearl Jam Taking Time Off, Won't Be Back For At Least A Year [News]
thread.title_full: Report: Pearl Jam Taking Time Off, Won't Be Back For At Least A Year [News]

title: Report: Pearl Jam Taking Time Off, Won't Be Back For At Least A Year [News]
text:
Posted 5 hours ago 3 
Asked about the possibility of Pearl Jam closing out the Joe Louis Arena in Detroit, retired NHL player Chris Chelios told 97.1 The Ticket's Jeff Riger that the band is actually set to take at least one year off. 
He said (via Alternative Nation ): "You know what - no. I'll be the first one to say that they had a meeting about a month ago, and decided they aren't going to go on tour for at least a year. They're going to take a break." 
Back in August 2015, bassist Jeff Ament said the band was aiming to release a new record in 2016. Whether or not the boys will dedicate themselves to writing and recording during the alleged break or just take time off remains to be seen. 
The latest Pearl Jam album, " Lightning Bolt ," saw its release in October 2013.
